Here are some foundational principles behind how to build better automations. These work across platforms, across use cases, and across programming languages, and I consider them core to how I do things.

Follow me on other platforms üòà

Why watch?
If this is your first view‚Äîhi, I‚Äôm Nick! TLDR: I spent six years building automated businesses with Make.com (most notably 1SecondCopy, a content company that hit 7 figures). Today a lot of people talk about automation, but I‚Äôve noticed that very few have practical, real world success making money with it. So this channel is me chiming in and showing you what *real* systems that make *real* revenue look like.

Hopefully I can help you improve your business, and in doing so, the rest of your life üôè

Like, subscribe, and leave me a comment if you have a specific request! Thanks.

core_summary.core_concepts: The video discusses foundational principles for building better automations that can be applied across various platforms and programming languages.
key_insights: Importance of reverse engineering in automation.

prerequisites: Basic understanding of automation tools and programming concepts
learning_objectives: Learn how to create effective automation systems
Understand key principles and methodologies for successful automation

steps.title: Introduction to Automation Principles
steps.description: Overview of the foundational principles behind automation.

steps.title: The Importance of Reverse Engineering
steps.description: Explains how reverse engineering can aid in building automations.
key_points: Key strategies for analyzing existing systems.

steps.title: Example of Building an Automation
steps.description: Provides a practical example of creating an automation.

steps.title: Step-by-Step Approach to Building
steps.description: Details a structured approach to developing automation.

steps.title: Test-Driven Development Explained
steps.description: Covers the concept of test-driven development in automations.

steps.title: Edge Cases and Practical Solutions
steps.description: Discusses handling edge cases in automation.
key_points: Strategies for dealing with unexpected scenarios.

steps.title: Conclusion and Call to Action
steps.description: Summarizes the key points and encourages viewer engagement.
